summary: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.
cast: Jenny Agutter|Luc Roeg|David Gulpilil|John Meillon|Robert McDarra|Peter Carver|John Illingsworth|Hilary Bamberger|Barry Donnelly|Noeline Brown|Carlo Manchini|George Roubicek
title: Walkabout
